summary: Comprehensive testing of Advanced Product Filters feature completed successfully. Backend returns available_filters with models, colors, sizes, specifications, materials, brands. Frontend FilterPanel displays Product Specific Filters section with all filter types. Product cards display advanced attributes (color, size, material badges and specifications table). All filtering functionality working correctly.

minor.issue: Fallback detection matches 'phone' in 'headphone' query due to substring matching order

passed_tests: Backend /api/search returns available_filters object with models, colors, sizes, specifications, materials, brands
Laptop search returns laptop-specific specs: RAM (8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB), Storage (256GB-2TB SSD), Processor (Intel i5-i9, AMD Ryzen, Apple M3)
Phone search returns phone-specific specs: RAM, Camera, Display with storage sizes (64GB-1TB)
Shoes search returns shoe-specific specs: Type, Closure, Sole with UK sizes (UK 6-12)
Shirt search returns shirt-specific specs: Fit, Sleeve, Collar with clothing sizes (S-XXXL)
TV search returns TV-specific specs: Resolution, Panel, Refresh Rate with screen sizes (32-85 inch)
Product cards display color badges with color indicator dots
Product cards display size badges (e.g., '16 inch', 'UK 8')
Product cards display material badges (e.g., 'Aluminum', 'Magnesium Alloy')
Product cards display specifications table (RAM, Storage, Processor values)
Filter panel shows 'Product Specific Filters' section
Brand dropdown filter present and functional
Model dropdown filter present and functional
Color button filters (All, Silver, Black, Space Gray, White, Blue) working - Black filter reduced 50 to 8 results
Size button filters (13-17 inch for laptops, UK 6-12 for shoes) working - 16 inch filter reduced 50 to 12 results
Material dropdown filter present and functional
Specifications section with dynamic dropdowns (RAM, Storage, Processor for laptops)
RAM specification filter working - 16GB filter reduced 50 to 7 results
Storage specification filter working - 512GB SSD combined with RAM filter reduced to 1 result
Reset filters button clears all advanced filters and restores full results
Different product types show appropriate filters (laptops vs phones vs shoes vs shirts)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Advanced filtering feature fully implemented and tested. Backend returns available_filters with product-specific data. Frontend FilterPanel has Product Specific Filters section with Brand, Model, Color, Size, Material dropdowns/buttons and dynamic Specifications filters. All filtering correctly reduces product list.
